definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒並決定減少壓力和調整飲食，改變現狀。

sentences.english: In our consulting practice, we reverse the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的諮詢實踐中，我們改變了程序。

sentences.english: Change that arrangement and you can dramatically alter the resulting organism.
sentences.chinese: 改變這個排列你就能完全改變最後的生物體。

sentences.english: Change that arrangement and you can dramatically alter the resulting organism.
sentences.chinese: 改變這個排列你就能完全改變最後的生物體。

sentences.english: Knowlegde can change your fate and English can accomplish your future.
sentences.chinese: 知識改變命運，英文成就未來。

sentences.english: It seems unfair. Except at the margins, there isn't much we can do about physical attractiveness.
sentences.chinese: 似乎老天不太公平，我們不太能改變自己的長相。

sentences.english: Finding should change standard of care, which is 4 doses every 3 weeks, researchers say.
sentences.chinese: 研究員說該發現將改變每3周4次給藥的治療標準。

sentences.english: It was this journey that changed Jiang Hao’s life radically.
sentences.chinese: 正是這次美國之旅，徹底改變了姜浩的人生。

sentences.english: And as he prayed, the fashion of his countenance was altered, and his raiment was white and glistering.
sentences.chinese: 正禱告的時候，他的面貌就改變了，衣服潔白放光。

sentences.english: Compared with the Ming dynasty, the system of selecting officials in Qing dynasty had a big change.
sentences.chinese: 比之明代，清代的選官制度有了較大改變。

sentences.english: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.chinese: 先進航空學將會改變阿波羅和艦載機的加速器顏色。

sentences.english: To change this from the root, the government is duty-bound.
sentences.chinese: 從根本上改變這一狀況，政府責無旁貸。

sentences.english: And it’s goingto be up to you to make an even bigger difference over the next 40years.
sentences.chinese: 未來40年更大的改變也將取決於你們。

sentences.english: What changes have you made in the course of your career?
sentences.chinese: 在你的職業生涯中你已經做了什麼改變？

sentences.english: By recognizing the changing characteristics of your cervical mucus, you can predict when you'll ovulate.
sentences.chinese: 通過認識到宮頸粘液性狀的改變，可以預測排卵時間。

sentences.english: The libtard morons got change but for the worse.
sentences.chinese: 自由主義白癡們改變了，但卻變得更糟。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
